quiz.question: _____ lounge
quiz.explanation: 休息室，酒店休息室。Guests gathered in the hotel lounge. 客人们聚集在酒店休息室。

quiz.question: expunge ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 删除，删除记录。The court agreed to expunge the record. 法院同意删除记录。

quiz.question: ____ surcharge
quiz.explanation: 附加费，燃油附加费。Airlines added a fuel surcharge to tickets. 航空公司在机票上增加了燃油附加费。

quiz.question: _________ discharge
quiz.explanation: 解雇，光荣退伍。The soldier received an honorable discharge. 士兵获得了光荣退伍。

quiz.question: _____ diverge
quiz.explanation: 分歧，道路分歧。The paths diverge at the fork. 道路在岔口分歧。

quiz.question: _______ dirge
quiz.explanation: 挽歌，葬礼挽歌。The choir sang a somber funeral dirge. 合唱团唱了一首庄严的葬礼挽歌。

quiz.question: forge _ _________
quiz.explanation: 伪造，伪造签名。It is illegal to forge a signature. 伪造签名是非法的。

quiz.question: splurge ________
quiz.explanation: 挥霍，挥霍购物。She decided to splurge shopping during the sale. 她决定在促销期间挥霍购物。

quiz.question: scourge __ ___
quiz.explanation: 灾祸，战争灾祸。The scourge of war affected millions. 战争灾祸影响了数百万人。

quiz.question: purge _______
quiz.explanation: 清除，清除记录。The company would purge records annually. 公司每年会清除记录。

quiz.question: resurge __ __________
quiz.explanation: 复兴，复兴流行。Vinyl records would resurge in popularity. 黑胶唱片会复兴流行。

quiz.question: ____ gauge
quiz.explanation: 仪表，燃油仪表。Check the fuel gauge before driving. 驾驶前检查燃油仪表。

quiz.question: ____ __ subterfuge
quiz.explanation: 诡计，诡计的策略。His claim was just a ploy of subterfuge. 他的声明只是诡计的策略。

quiz.question: ______ cache
quiz.explanation: 藏匿处，秘密藏匿处。They discovered a secret cache of weapons. 他们发现了秘密藏匿处武器。

quiz.question: ___ _ _____ __ panache
quiz.explanation: 神气，增添一丝神气。She would add a touch of panache to every outfit. 她会为每套服装增添一丝神气。

quiz.question: _____ cliché
quiz.explanation: 陈词滥调，陈腐的陈词滥调。The speech was full of stale cliché. 演讲充满了陈腐的陈词滥调。

quiz.question: ______ niche
quiz.explanation: 利基，市场利基。The company found a profitable market niche. 公司找到了有利可图的市场利基。

quiz.question: ________ pastiche
quiz.explanation: 模仿作品，艺术模仿作品。The film was an artistic pastiche of noir classics. 这部电影是黑色经典的艺术模仿作品。

quiz.question: ____ avalanche
quiz.explanation: 雪崩，雪崩。The snow avalanche buried the village. 雪崩掩埋了村庄。

quiz.question: ______ gauche
quiz.explanation: 笨拙的，社交笨拙的。His social gauche behavior embarrassed everyone. 他社交笨拙的行为让每个人都尴尬。

quiz.question: _____ psyche
quiz.explanation: 心灵，人类心灵。The study explored the human psyche. 这项研究探索了人类心灵。

quiz.question: ___ apostrophe
quiz.explanation: 撇号，使用撇号。Remember to use apostrophe in contractions. 记得在缩写中使用撇号。

quiz.question: wreathe __ ______
quiz.explanation: 环绕，笑容环绕。Her face would wreathe in smiles. 她的脸会笑容环绕。

quiz.question: ____ lathe
quiz.explanation: 车床，木工车床。The craftsman used a wood lathe. 工匠使用木工车床。

quiz.question: loathe __ _____
quiz.explanation: 厌恶，厌恶承认。He was loathe to admit his mistake. 他厌恶承认自己的错误。

quiz.question: lithe ______
quiz.explanation: 柔软的，柔软的身材。The dancer had a lithe figure. 舞者有柔软的身材。

quiz.question: blithe ______
quiz.explanation: 无忧无虑的，无忧无虑的精神。She had a blithe spirit that charmed everyone. 她有无忧无虑的精神迷住了每个人。

quiz.question: _____ scythe
quiz.explanation: 镰刀，锋利的镰刀。The farmer used a sharp scythe to cut wheat. 农民用锋利的镰刀割麦子。

quiz.question: belie ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 掩饰，掩饰声明。The facts belie the claim. 事实掩饰声明。

quiz.question: bonhomie ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 友善，友善和温暖。He greeted everyone with bonhomie and warmth. 他以友善和温暖迎接每个人。

quiz.question: stymie ________
quiz.explanation: 阻碍，阻碍进展。Bureaucracy would stymie progress. 官僚主义会阻碍进展。

quiz.question: magpie __________
quiz.explanation: 喜鹊，喜鹊收集。She had a habit of magpie collecting shiny objects. 她有喜鹊收集闪亮物品的习惯。

quiz.question: ______ gaucherie
quiz.explanation: 笨拙，社交笨拙。His social gaucherie was obvious. 他的社交笨拙很明显。

quiz.question: _____ coterie
quiz.explanation: 小圈子，精英小圈子。An elite coterie controlled the organization. 精英小圈子控制着该组织。

quiz.question: calorie ______
quiz.explanation: 卡路里，卡路里摄入量。Monitor your calorie intake for health. 监控你的卡路里摄入量以保持健康。

quiz.question: vie ___ ________
quiz.explanation: 竞争，竞争位置。Candidates vie for position in the race. 候选人竞争位置在竞选中。

quiz.question: slake ___'_ ______
quiz.explanation: 解渴，解渴。Cold water would slake one's thirst. 冷水会解渴。

quiz.question: stake _ _____
quiz.explanation: 立桩，立桩声明。The prospectors would stake a claim. 勘探者会立桩声明。

quiz.question: _____ hike
quiz.explanation: 上涨，价格上涨。The company announced a price hike. 公司宣布价格上涨。

quiz.question: spike __ _____
quiz.explanation: 激增，病例激增。There was a spike in cases last month. 上个月病例激增。

quiz.question: _____ spoke
quiz.explanation: 辐条，车轮辐条。A wheel spoke was broken. 车轮辐条断了。

quiz.question: stoke _ ____
quiz.explanation: 添柴，添柴生火。He would stoke a fire throughout the night. 他整夜都会添柴生火。

quiz.question: evoke _______
quiz.explanation: 唤起，唤起情感。The music would evoke emotion. 音乐会唤起情感。

quiz.question: convoke _ _______
quiz.explanation: 召集，召集会议。The chairman would convoke a meeting. 主席会召集会议。

quiz.question: yoke ________
quiz.explanation: 束缚，束缚在一起。The oxen were yoked together. 牛被束缚在一起。

quiz.question: _____ rebuke
quiz.explanation: 斥责，严厉的斥责。The teacher gave a sharp rebuke. 老师给予了严厉的斥责。

quiz.question: _______ locale
quiz.explanation: 地点，旅游地点。The town was a popular tourist locale. 这个镇是受欢迎的旅游地点。

quiz.question: gale _______
quiz.explanation: 大风，大风警报。The weather service issued a gale warning. 气象局发布了大风警报。

quiz.question: regale ______
quiz.explanation: 款待，款待客人。The host would regale guests with stories. 主人会用故事款待客人。

quiz.question: hale ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 健壮的，健壮和精神饱满。He remained hale and hearty in old age. 他在老年保持健壮和精神饱满。

quiz.question: inhale ______
quiz.explanation: 吸入，深深吸入。Inhale deeply to relax. 深深吸入以放松。

quiz.question: shale ___
quiz.explanation: 页岩，页岩气。Shale gas extraction is controversial. 页岩气开采存在争议。

quiz.question: _____ finale
quiz.explanation: 终曲，宏大的终曲。The concert ended with a grand finale. 音乐会以宏大的终曲结束。

quiz.question: _____ morale
quiz.explanation: 士气，提高士气。The victory would boost morale. 胜利会提高士气。

quiz.question: imperturbable ____
quiz.explanation: 沉着的，沉着的冷静。He maintained imperturbable calm. 他保持沉着的冷静。

quiz.question: impeccable _____
quiz.explanation: 无可挑剔的，无可挑剔的品味。She had impeccable taste in fashion. 她在时尚方面有无可挑剔的品味。

quiz.question: irradicable ____
quiz.explanation: 根深蒂固的，根深蒂固的偏见。The irradicable bias affected decisions. 根深蒂固的偏见影响了决定。

quiz.question: applicable ___
quiz.explanation: 适用的，适用的法律。The applicable law was unclear. 适用的法律不明确。

quiz.question: explicable ______
quiz.explanation: 可解释的，可解释的原因。There must be an explicable reason. 必须有可解释的原因。

quiz.question: inexplicable _____
quiz.explanation: 无法解释的，无法解释的事件。The inexplicable event puzzled scientists. 无法解释的事件困扰着科学家。

quiz.question: amicable __________
quiz.explanation: 友好的，友好的和解。They reached an amicable settlement. 他们达成了友好的和解。

quiz.question: ______ extricable
quiz.explanation: 可解脱的，容易可解脱的。The problem was easily extricable. 这个问题是容易可解脱的。

quiz.question: irrevocable ________
quiz.explanation: 不可撤销的，不可撤销的决定。He made an irrevocable decision. 他做出了不可撤销的决定。

quiz.question: affordable _______
quiz.explanation: 负担得起的，负担得起的住房。The city needs more affordable housing. 城市需要更多负担得起的住房。

quiz.question: ineffaceable __________
quiz.explanation: 不可磨灭的，不可磨灭的印象。She left an ineffaceable impression. 她留下了不可磨灭的印象。

quiz.question: traceable ______
quiz.explanation: 可追溯的，可追溯的来源。The problem had a traceable source. 问题有可追溯的来源。

quiz.question: serviceable _________
quiz.explanation: 可用的，可用的状态。The car was in serviceable condition. 汽车处于可用的状态。

quiz.question: agreeable _______
quiz.explanation: 宜人的，宜人的气候。The region had an agreeable climate. 该地区有宜人的气候。

quiz.question: disagreeable ____
quiz.explanation: 令人不快的，令人不快的气味。A disagreeable odor filled the room. 令人不快的气味充满了房间。

quiz.question: interchangeable _____
quiz.explanation: 可互换的，可互换的零件。The machine used interchangeable parts. 机器使用可互换的零件。

quiz.question: malleable _____
quiz.explanation: 可塑的，可塑的金属。Gold is a malleable metal. 黄金是可塑的金属。

quiz.question: permeable ________
quiz.explanation: 可渗透的，可渗透的膜。The permeable membrane allows water through. 可渗透的膜允许水通过。

quiz.question: impermeable ________
quiz.explanation: 不透水的，不透水的膜。The impermeable membrane blocked all moisture. 不透水的膜阻止了所有湿气。

quiz.question: affable ____
quiz.explanation: 和蔼可亲的，和蔼可亲的主人。The affable host welcomed everyone. 和蔼可亲的主人欢迎每个人。

quiz.question: ineffable ___
quiz.explanation: 难以言表的，难以言表的喜悦。She experienced ineffable joy. 她经历了难以言表的喜悦。

quiz.question: indefatigable ______
quiz.explanation: 不知疲倦的，不知疲倦的工人。He was an indefatigable worker. 他是不知疲倦的工人。

quiz.question: unimpeachable ______
quiz.explanation: 无可指责的，无可指责的来源。The information came from an unimpeachable source. 信息来自无可指责的来源。

quiz.question: perishable _____
quiz.explanation: 易腐的，易腐的商品。Store perishable goods in the refrigerator. 将易腐的商品存放在冰箱中。

quiz.question: appreciable __________
quiz.explanation: 可察觉的，可察觉的差异。There was an appreciable difference. 有可察觉的差异。

quiz.question: inappreciable ______
quiz.explanation: 微不足道的，微不足道的变化。The inappreciable change went unnoticed. 微不足道的变化未被注意到。

quiz.question: sociable ______
quiz.explanation: 好交际的，好交际的本性。He had a sociable nature. 他有好交际的本性。

quiz.question: irremediable ____
quiz.explanation: 无法补救的，无法补救的伤害。The accident caused irremediable harm. 事故造成了无法补救的伤害。

quiz.question: justifiable ________
quiz.explanation: 正当的，正当的杀人。The court ruled it was justifiable homicide. 法院裁定这是正当的杀人。

quiz.question: pliable ________
quiz.explanation: 柔韧的，柔韧的材料。The pliable material bent easily. 柔韧的材料容易弯曲。

quiz.question: amiable ___________
quiz.explanation: 和蔼可亲的，和蔼可亲的性格。She had an amiable personality. 她有和蔼可亲的性格。

quiz.question: inexpiable _____
quiz.explanation: 无法赎罪的，无法赎罪的罪行。He felt inexpiable guilt. 他感到无法赎罪的罪行。

quiz.question: friable ____
quiz.explanation: 易碎的，易碎的土壤。The friable soil crumbled easily. 易碎的土壤容易碎裂。

quiz.question: insatiable ________
quiz.explanation: 贪得无厌的，贪得无厌的食欲。He had an insatiable appetite for knowledge. 他对知识有贪得无厌的食欲。

quiz.question: viable ____
quiz.explanation: 可行的，可行的计划。They developed a viable plan. 他们制定了可行的计划。

quiz.question: nonviable ______
quiz.explanation: 不能存活的，不能存活的胚胎。The nonviable embryo could not develop. 不能存活的胚胎无法发育。

quiz.question: irreconcilable ___________
quiz.explanation: 不可调和的，不可调和的分歧。They had irreconcilable differences. 他们有不可调和的分歧。

quiz.question: inviolable ______
quiz.explanation: 不可侵犯的，不可侵犯的权利。Human dignity is an inviolable rights. 人的尊严是不可侵犯的权利。

quiz.question: irredeemable ____
quiz.explanation: 无法挽回的，无法挽回的债务。The company faced irredeemable debt. 公司面临无法挽回的债务。

quiz.question: estimable _________
quiz.explanation: 值得尊敬的，值得尊敬的品格。He was known for his estimable character. 他以值得尊敬的品格闻名。

quiz.question: flammable ______
quiz.explanation: 易燃的，易燃的液体。Store flammable liquid carefully. 小心存放易燃的液体。

quiz.question: nonflammable ________
quiz.explanation: 不易燃的，不易燃的材料。Use nonflammable material for safety. 为了安全使用不易燃的材料。

quiz.question: presumable _____
quiz.explanation: 可推测的，可推测的原因。The presumable cause was equipment failure. 可推测的原因是设备故障。

quiz.question: inalienable ______
quiz.explanation: 不可剥夺的，不可剥夺的权利。All people have inalienable rights. 所有人都有不可剥夺的权利。

quiz.question: amenable __ ______
quiz.explanation: 顺从的，顺从理性。He was amenable to reason. 他顺从理性。

quiz.question: tenable ________
quiz.explanation: 站得住脚的，站得住脚的论点。She presented a tenable argument. 她提出了站得住脚的论点。
